name: CreateWebhookSetting
description:
Creates a new webhook setting in Ashby.

This tool creates a webhook setting in Ashby. It should be called when you need to set up a new webhook to receive event notifications. Ensure the necessary permissions are granted.

parameters.name: webhook_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the webhook type, request URL, and optional secret token.

requestUrl.description: The URL the webhook will send requests to.

secretToken.description: The secret token used to sign the webhook request. See our documentation [here](https://developers.ashbyhq.com/docs/authenticating-webhooks) for more information.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API

requestUrl.description: The URL the webhook will send requests to.

secretToken.description: The secret token used to sign the webhook request. See our documentation [here](https://developers.ashbyhq.com/docs/authenticating-webhooks) for more information.
